query:
CREATE TABLE invite_codes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  createdBy INT NOT NULL,
  usedBy INT,
  maxUses INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  currentUses INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  expiresAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  description VARCHAR(255),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute CREATE TABLE invite_codes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  createdBy INT NOT NULL,
  usedBy INT,
  maxUses INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  currentUses INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  expiresAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  description VARCHAR(255),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
